name: Movie Genre Machine Learning
tagline: Predicting movie genre based on a model using movie posters and other movie metadata.
body:
This repository contains many notebooks outlining my very first data science project suitable for my data science portfolio. Here is a brief description of each:

### [Introduction](https://github.com/kylevigil/MovieGenreML/blob/master/01-Introduction.ipynb)
This gives an overview of the project and some intro into why I chose it.

### [Data Cleaning](https://github.com/kylevigil/MovieGenreML/blob/master/02-DataCleaning.ipynb)
This notebook cleans all of the MovieLens dataset into one table that is crucial for making the model.
* [Color Clusters](https://github.com/kylevigil/MovieGenreML/blob/master/02a-ColorClusters.ipynb)
: Helper notebook to find the most popular color of movie posters
* [Genres](https://github.com/kylevigil/MovieGenreML/blob/master/02b-Genres.ipynb)
: Helper notebook to find the overarching genre of movies

### [Exploration](https://github.com/kylevigil/MovieGenreML/blob/master/03-Exploration.ipynb)
Exploring the data with graphs and figures. Looking for correlation to genres

### [Machine Learning](https://github.com/kylevigil/MovieGenreML/blob/master/04-MachineLearning.ipynb)
Fitting a model to predict movie genre

### [Presentation](https://github.com/kylevigil/MovieGenreML/blob/master/05-Presentation.ipynb)
General overview of the project, contains all of the juicy interesting information.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
